resonance.name: High Voltage
resonance.description: Affected by Hydro for 40% less time. Superconduct, Overloaded, Electro-Charged, Quicken, Aggravate, or Hyperbloom have a 100% chance to generate an Electro Elemental Particle (CD: 5s)

reactions.name: Superconduct
reactions.description: Deals AoE Cryo damage and reduces the Physical resistance of enemies caught in the AoE by 40%

reactions.name: Overloaded
reactions.description: Causes an explosion that deals AoE Pyro damage

reactions.name: Electro-Charged
reactions.description: Deals Electro damage over time to all nearby targets with the Wet status

reactions.name: Quicken
reactions.description: Triggered when applying Dendro to an entity with the Quicken aura. Adds Flat Damage Bonus to the attack that triggers this reaction

sub-reactions.name: Aggravate
sub-reactions.description: Triggered when applying Electro to an entity with the Quicken aura. Adds Flat DMG Bonus to the attack that triggers this reaction

reactions.name: Hyperbloom
reactions.description: Triggered when applying Electro to a Dendro Core. Transforms the Dendro Core into a homing Sprawling Shot that deals increased AoE Dendro damage in a much smaller AoE
